content.detailedDescription: It was nine oclock pm i stepped outside to see why dogs were barking and to have a cigarette and looked up an seen it flying from the southeast towards me then stop an hover it was bright red and round it was very large. probly around 150 to 300 ft around made no noise then flew off very fast to the north. shortly after it left the dogs in the neighborhood stopped barking. i got to pics will try to download
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was round and bright red very large maybe up to 300 ft around

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southbound on 50th street west when i was coming across a four-way stop intersection and for some reason i looked up at a light that caught my attention, at first i thought is was getting dizzy, but then i noticed the pulsating light descending at extreme speed then suddenly stop and the light would fade and then it ascended at fast speed, i noticed it went side ways and it just hovered for a while, this isn't the first time i see something like this, it seems like it was near my home area, i was not the only witness to this.
content.summary: Went down on high speed.Sudden stop then went up at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on one of my locations (oil and gas) and thought the moon looked like a good picture, so i snapped several different pictures looking west and all within a minutes time! i didn't notice anything in the pictures until i was looking at them on my iphone and thought i had something on my screen and that's when i saw it was actually in the picture, there were no planes or helicopters and don't remember any birds or anything flying around! when i zoom in on the photo it looks disc shaped almost, not really sure what it is as it doesn't look like a bird or aircraft such as plane or helicopter! i have included 2 of the pictures and you will notice a black object just above the moon in the one picture and the other picture taken just seconds later but the object is gone, like i said not really sure what to make of it
content.summary: Taking pictures of early morning full moon

content.detailedDescription: My daughter came to pick up our grandson at approximately 8 pm, saturday,december 26,2015. she had gone out the door and came back to the door and said for me to come out and look in the sky. orange- yellow orbs were floating from the south to the north. they seemed as high as an airplane would be.I tried to make sense of what i saw. the pattern in the sky was like a constellation that was moving. the spacing between the objects remained the same. the orbs did not pulsate or flicker. the whole event took less than 5 minutes. my daughter attempted to take a photo but had no room on her cell phone. it was a very surreal event.I cannot understand what i saw!
content.summary: Lanterns in sky floating in a south to north path ; looked like the big dipper in orange moving across sky.  i couldn't discern how high they were; no noise

content.detailedDescription: I saw the orange glow almost directly up in the sky. in the direction of john c. munroe airport. it was a huge orange glow. the ceiling was 1500 feet according to the weather network so it was below that. i took a picture with my cell phone and it flashed. after that it moved to the west real fast and was gone in about 3-5 seconds. it was 4 degrees and a light rain. this happened around 8:15 pm. i am adding a photo but they never do the siting justice. it was much more spectacular in real life.
content.summary: Driving home from work. there was an orange glow in the sky close to home. i stopped in turn land and took a pic. my camera flashed and it took off like a shot to the west toward brantford t in 3 sec gone.

content.detailedDescription:
Video capture of an orb flyby at close range.  i've seen these speed by many times but they move so fast, it is hard for me to reach for my camera, start it up and point it in the right direction and zoom.  i nailed it this time!  i know my v520 good enough to know you cannot hold down the zoom button.  you have to slowly ease into it for the cameras auto-focus to kick in.  this orb was less than a quarter mile away so it was very close.  i could not zoom in as much as i wanted but i was able to stabilize and slow down the footage.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?  i was on my side yard.  i had my video camera and telescope at the ready to see another ufo.

2. what made you first notice the object? sky fishing from the east. i saw a fast moving object.  i first thought it was far away, but i realized it was close.  i reached for my video camera and tried to keep a cool head.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?  i knew it was an orb the second i spotted it.  it was moving very fast. too fast for a bird much less a balloon.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.  it headed west from the east.  it stayed at a consistent height.  it just moved very fast. it was elongated, not round.  i think the front was a little flatish.  

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.  i usually miss it because i am too slow to react.  it leaves me with my chin hitting the ground and i am angry that i missed another speeding orb. my friends and i see objects like this all the time but they are not as fast so we can capture them with our telescope.  we invite you to come with us so you can see them with your own eyes. if you've never seen a ufo, you'll flip out.  we are located in the los angeles area.  la ufo channel.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?  i kept one eye on the object as i pointed my video camera towards the object (i have a tracking system).  i simply lost sight of it.  i was going to be obstructed by my house anyway.
content.summary: Finally, i was able to capture a few seconds of an orb flyby at close range

content.detailedDescription: It was approx.11:25pm.I went out side for a smoke, when i first steped out i saw green and red flashing light, i immediatly thought it was a plane and for about 5 seconds payed it no mind, but when i turned back to look again i thought it strange that it was not moving. that's when i really focused on the light and realized it was not a plane and helo's normally don't at night in my area. the sky was clear enough to see the full moon and a few stars,there was no low level cloud. i hurried in to get my camera and went to the fence to get a steady vantage point, as i was trying to pan the object it continued to blink, but only green, bright fuorescent green. it really freaked me out. i was so excited i was trying not to vibrate,and then it moved in a straight line approx.West,south, west about a few hundred meters,in my gestimation.So i moved down the fence to see if i could still get video, scratched my,didn't care, i was filming a ufo,and i don't care what anybody says,i know what i saw and videoed. it kind of wabled back and forth a bit, it blinked off for a millisecond,and then after a few more seconded it just disappeared,gone,no sound no noth'n. i have pic's of the moon as well because date is wrong on the camera i used a nikon coolpix 320, with 26x optical zoom.
content.summary: Green in color, glowing flashed intermitant,no sound,orb like.

content.detailedDescription: I have 25 minutes worth of video if an object levitating. it was called a titan rocket launch.
content.summary: Object called a rocket launch. but it just hovers. plasma appears to come in and out of the object.  i have video of the event.

content.detailedDescription:
Well this was a very exciting experience, it's the first time i can say without question that i saw a ufo, five of them to be precise, but only managed to caputre one in photo and video.

was visiting a relative on christmas day and at dusk, late evening, i was taking a cup of ice water out to place in the cup holder of another relatives car for them, as they were about to leave. i noticed upon walking out the front door a column of five round red lights in the distance but thought nothing of it at that moment thinking it was aviation warning lights on a radio tower. having finished what i'd gone outside to do i looked up again to discover that the lights had moved, three of them were now in a position forming the points of a triangle with two positioned centered vertical beneath. i ran back in to tell my family members to come check out the ufos and to grab my camera.. which was apparently already in my pocket.

when the first relatives came out the formation had broken up and two of the lights zoomed off (direction unknown as i was fiddling with my camera when that ocurred). by the time i had gotten my camera turned on, and configured for night shot, there was only one of the objects still clearly visible, which is the red-orange colored object in the rather poor quality photos and one video i managed. the vertical line in the images is due to a defect with the still image pick-up sensor on the digital camera.

the objects appeared roughgly due south from the location i was at. the other four objects originally seen along with this one went traveled off in what appeared to be south and southwest directions, was rather hard to tell due to the patches of heavy cloud cover and rain. the one that stuck around and got imaged dropped down to just above perceivable tree top level and then traveled east - southeast on a level plain before it vanished.

the location of appearence would place the objects as having appeared over the southern edge of pickens county or northern edge of anderson county, pending what the actual distance was, which i'm personally thinking was between a half-mile, but no further than three miles simply due to the heavy clouds and scattered rain storms which were moving through the area at that time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Christmas day 2015 sighting in the evening sky - picken county

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

last night, christmas 2015, at 5:30pm, my son and i saw some strange bright floating lights east of the phoenix, az, metro area, near the superstition mountains. 

we we driving north on the az 347 and watched them for about 25 minutes. there were as many as 4 possibly 5, they appeared to be in a formation of sorts at times. 

it is difficult to say how far away from us they were, but we didn't think more than 100-150miles. we had good visibility here last night.

and they were very bright, much too bright to be stars as the sun had just set and it was still light out.  they sometimes seemed to merge into 1 or 2 lights. my son said that he saw one of them make a short blue line and then disappeared in an instant.

we didn't think they were helicopters. the light was very bright and they appeared to be hovering about a mile up.

we would like to know what they were. i thought you would like to know as well.
content.summary: Floating lights, christmas 2015, phoenix, az, 5:30pm

content.detailedDescription: Me and two other friends were playing hide and go seek in a neighborhood next to where we live in howell nj around mid 90s so two of us me n friend #1 were looking for friend # 2 hiding in some ones yard on one street in that neighborhood while we was looking for our friend we noticed it got darker like we were in a shadow so friend #1 said look up and i seen a big circle shaped airplane with a back fin fly over us making no noise other then it cutting through the air and friend #1 said that was a ufo and i said so and then it took a couple seconds to register and i look at him and i said that was a ufo so i started running and calling for friend #2 to come of hiding game over this is not a joke so he came out we told him a ufo just flew over at low height and friend # 2 didnt believe me and friend #1 so i said either way im leaving so we got a little distance away and i pointed out the direction it flew over us we noticed blinking lights ironically red white and blue the colors were and we watched it for 20 mins and it looked like it was just hovering there in the distance so friend #2 said that does look weird but i still dont believe u guys so friend #2 wanted to cut through a trail through the woods that seperates the neighborhood we"re in and where we live but i said im not going through the woods and we get abducted so i said lets walk down the road further and go down a side road that leads to hihgway and walk down the highway back home so as we got down to the side road about quarter way down that road wich is a short road between the neighborhood and the highway we seen the craft come from the side of us and turn heading right at us actually at a very slow speed and i didnt notice lights when it was up close only when we thought it was hovering in the distance it looked like red white and blue lights blinking around it and friend #1 said to friend #2 there it goes thats what we seen as it was flying towards us and friend #2 said pretty much forget that i believe u guys now and took of running down the road towards the highway and so did i as i was running i got a real bad cramp in my side about 20ft from where i started running and i had to stop running so i looked back and seen friend #1 still standing there looking at the craft and it was getting closer but very slowly and i started yelling his name a couple times and he finally responded what i yelled run he said he couldnt move i yelled his name and said run now and he turned aroung and started running towards me inwich i was closer to the highway and inwich i figured if we get abducted or whatever people will see on the highway and as my friend got closer i noticed it started flying the other way it did 180 degree turn without stopping or slowing down and we got to the highway we met up with are other friend down the highway we went back to my house told my mom and brother they checked are pupils thinking we were on lsd or drugs and friend #1 and 2 were crying cause they were scared and i wanted to go back and after that we seen it flying low over the woods between the neighborhoods for the next 2 weeks every night me and my other 2 friends  but what made it weird was anytime we had other friends waiting to see it over the woods it would never come as soon as they would leave we would see it and it was like it had to be me and my two other friends are the only ones that can see it and after it all i felt amazed by it wondering what would happen if i got abducted or i feel bad that at one piont while calling for my friend standing there i wanted to see what would happen if the craft got over my friend would it of beamed him up i asked him what happend and he said he couldnt move like he was mermorized or something
content.summary: Seen gray disc shaped craft fly over me and friend while playing hide n seek when we was looking for other friend then it came back like it was after us

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from dinner i spotted a light descending over the north pasadena area. at firtst it looked like a firework, but then i wondered why it was coming down and not going up? as i was driving a tree blocked my view and it was gone after that.
content.summary: Decending light trail

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i-17, 10 miles south of camp verde, az. it was mid afternoon (2pm). as i was driving, obviously i had to keep my eye on the road, a football shaped object appeared and disappeared within a second. the object had to be about 750 feet in length. i admit, if i saw this and didn't get confirmation of someone else seeing it, i would've blew it off. what confirmed my sighting, was another vehicle to the left of me (passing lane on i-17). as soon as i saw it, it disappeared. i said to my passenger, "did you see that?". passenger response, "what?". i responded, "there was something right there". same time i was pointing to where i saw the object. passenger, was like yeah right and around that same time i observed the passing car with two people in it and the driver in that car was pointing in the same direction as i was. i assume he was telling his passenger the same thing. i then told my passenger, "look, he saw what i saw". i believed proof of the other car driver, pointing to where i saw the object would be enough to prove to my passenger that i did see a 750 feet silver object in the sky.
content.summary: Driving during the day, made this trip numerous times. as i was driving, i briefly saw an object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
As my wife and i were driving home from dinner on christmas eve, we were driving near the space and rocket museum at huntsville al. we noticed that alignment of the large moon and the saturn 5 rocket so we wanted to take some pictures. i was driving and noticed nothing unusual. my wife saw something on the screen but she could not see it in the sky and it intrigued her. we opened up the images on christmas day and she was keen to show me. if i were a visitor from outer space i would also like to visit the space and rocket museum.

i was driving 70mph and it was just after sunset at 5:13pm. the camera was an i phone 6. i rotated the images in gimp. if someone wants the originals we can upload those.
content.summary: Christmas eve ufo's next to the space and rocket museum near the saturn 5 rocket.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in the interbalnearia route at the balneario la tuna in canelones, uruguay. i was in the back side of my car when suddenly, i saw trough the window to the south when there was a big object rising from the horizon. i asked to my parents "what is that thing?". both and i were impressed of that thing. it was a ball, smaller than a common star, and from the sides it had two big white triangles, i don´t know if they were lights or what... we stopped the car to appreciate that thing. it moved slowly, from the south to the north west in a straight line. we looked at that object for about 10 minutes. we got distracted for one second when suddenly it disappeared. it didn´t made any noise. we were surprised and interested on know what was that.
i dont have any photo or video. all what i know is what i remember.
content.summary: It was a small point like a star with two big white triangles in his sides. it quickly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Same as canora siting but forgot to ad another pic
content.summary: Added picture from canora siting

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened on christmas night 2015 at 5:50 pm on trimmer road in stoutsville ohio. these were the weather conditions at that time temp  50.0 °f	dew point 43.0 °f humidity 77% baramotric pressure 30.24 in	visibility 10.0 mi  winds north at 3.5 mph. estimated could base was 2430.556 feet.

a friend and myself were at my grandparents house and went outside, and walked behind the garage and were standing there talking. i looked at my phone and he said what is that in the sky i looked up and saw a bright white like like the landing light on a plane or helicopter. at first it moved very slow but once we really started paying attention it started to accelerate very fast it entered a cloud in front of us and we waited a couple seconds it did not exit the cloud but appeared in another cloud and kept repeating that like it was skipping from cloud to cloud we never saw it in open sky just in the clouds.The light did not light up the entire cloud only the light its self was visible. it moved in a straight line from west to east there was no noise or flashing lights of any kind we watched it for about 2-3 minutes until it was too far for us to see any more 

the 2 images i included are from google earth with some annotations
content.summary: Bright light appeared to be skipping from cloud to cloud

content.detailedDescription: It was the night of the eclipse. around 8:30 in the evening i took a picture with my cell phone around five seconds later i took another picture in the same place of the same direction of the eclipse. when i saw the photo i noticed the two spheres. i did not see them with the naked eye. the first photo i thought it was just an anomaly. but in the second photo just a few seconds later they both have moved.
content.summary: Night of eclipse.  taken with cell phone.  not seen by naked eye.  notice when viewed photo

content.detailedDescription: These were taken in saskatchewan from april 9 2015-april 15 2015.  found these very interesting so thought i would share. the photographer never noticed these until he was zooming in on them later. some of these pics are zoomed in quite a bit.
content.summary: Got this file from my family member that got it from an anonymous skywatcher from our town. he takes many pictures of the sky and found these cool pics when he was looking after at his sky sightings. he wants to remain anonymous but i found these interest

content.detailedDescription: These were taken in saskatchewan from april 9 2015-april 15 2015.  found these very interesting so thought i would share. the photographer never noticed these until he was zooming in on them later. some of these pics are zoomed in quite a bit.
content.summary: Got this file from my family member that got it from an anonymous skywatcher from our town. he takes many pictures of the sky and found these cool pics when he was looking after at his sky sightings. he wants to remain anonymous but i found these interest

content.detailedDescription:
I went to sunset cliffs to surf in the afternoon... just watching the sunset after and taking pics with my galaxy s5. shortly after sundown i noticed a solid white light hovering at several thousand feet over the ocean. it was then slowly tracking west and decending. it stopped at a couple hundred feet above the ocean, descended, ascended to the prior height, decended again, reascended, then slowly decended into the depths.... a dark helicopter was circling the area after then headed south. i was suspecting that it was a planned landing. after the incident i discovered an anomaly in the photos...An orb like i've never seen before. there are 4 bright orbs within, as well as a silloette of a humanoid/light being with arms out on the bottom 2 bright orbs. the only reason i belive this is not a digital anomaly is because of what i witnessed after the pictures were taken during sunset. i was too enthralled with the encounter to get the camera out and it was far off and darker then. this orb with a flat bottom, domed top, and inner orbs is glowing like a sundog illuminated through the clouds. i didn't see it at all until it looked like a bright unchanging point of white light, smaller in comparison to the orb. 
since 1993 i've had dozens of sightings of all types...Big, small, metallic, glowing, emenating auras, day, night, twilight, etc.
i lost an hour while living in lake tahoe along with an entire household. clocks, watches, battery or plugged in. all off one day. i was spotlighted on the back deck the first night i entered that house in tahoe donner. everyone who went in that house had experiences of being watched. the time lapse was 4 months later...
it's been 16 years since then and lately i'm witnessing all kind of new phenomenon. daytime high elevation metallic orbs, a satellite height ufo (solid white) moving 3 times as fast, all the way across the horizon west to east, but faded on a light as bright and as big as the moon (through aresol haze) on and then off in 5 seconds just once as it passed near overhead. early morning, 4 am. then 40 minutes later another on the same west to east path but no illumination 2nd pass, again moving triple or more than satellite speed. i believe in devine intervention through our collective consciousness.... i've had some amazing intuitive experiences lately. i am hopeful that these light-beings are here to witness the atrocities in place on this beautiful garden planet. if we all realize the potential conflict within and make peace with ourselves first, then we can reach peace on a global scale and work together on harmonizing the balance. war cannot bring peace. teach love. unconditionally.... only love can conquer a demon. be peaceful. stay at oneness. promote positivity and conciousness through actions. this is the message i'm getting...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed a solid white light shortly after sunset, hovering at several thousand feet. it then tracked west and descended to a couple hundred feet, climbed, descended, climbed then entered the sea. a dark helicopter returned from the landing site after.

content.detailedDescription:
During an elington tx air show, whike i was near by, i witnessed 4 pin size light at extremely hugh latitude move together form north south eadt west. tge south one circled around the north ine. while the other two remained stationary. after the air show, each light wehen back its direction it came.
a very very high altitude plain pasted between my and the 4 ufos. i didnt feel the plain was in that air show. the plain looked similarly to a 747 shape. not a fighter jet. the south ufo went down hw288 at what appeared to be the same every high altitute. hence i could see its reflection better from the sun. those ufo lighys hooved close like high laltitued monal satellites. ..If that exists.  1995 to 1999.
maybe a good place look.
content.summary: Was 4 white light hover around each other. very high altitute plain pasted by during air show. 4 ufos pin size left n s e w. south ufo went west in hw288.E

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to drop off a gift at a friends house, headed in the north east direction. i instantly noticed 8 bright red lights hovering in place in the sky in a weird diagnoal formation. i was extremely alarmed and pulled over into a church parking lot to take a picture. i got out my camera and the lights started to go away, i took a picture and got three of the lights photographed. once i looked at my phone to send to others as proof, the picture was extremely distorted and skewed. i then got a very intense migraine that lasted over four hours.
content.summary: 8 bright red lights were in a stationary formation in the sky hovering, one by one they were gone

content.detailedDescription: Was outside enjoying weather, letting dog out, and looking at near full moon.  i was looking at approaching planes that were in route to the local airport, when i noticed a few degrews to the left of flight path of incoming traffic, 4 bright reddish lights flying in straight line.  i thought it looked odd, then i was looking at how close the lights were together, way closer than normal aircraft would be.  i then started lookong for some kind of blinking lights, which all aircraft have, but did not see any lights or marker lights. i went to try to get videicamera, but could not get focused, so i used cell phone and recorded it briefly.  when i was trying to record them, even though they were approaching me, 1 at a time the lights got dimmer then dissapeared 1 at a time, thats why only 3 in video.  i looked at local media and did not see any notices.
content.summary: Bright lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
After watching an episode of mufon hanger 1, underground bases, i decided to share the following: 

i personally observed a countless number of circular shaped impressions like probable ufo landing sites on the ground which mimicked farming industry activities in may 1998.  i observed the aforementioned while flying onboard a usaf military airlift aircraft as a space available passenger with other active duty personnel and their family members from charleston afb to elmendorf afb, anchorage, alaska.  

at the time, i was an active duty usaf staff officer specializing in air battle management/air weapons control and airborne/ground radar & communications command & control planning and operations for a numbered af headquarters.  i was on authorized military leave going to a former colleague's sister's wedding in anchorage, alaska. 

with my intense curiosity, i visited the flight deck while flying over the northwest united states to ask the flight crew specifically about the vast number of unusual circles on the grounds below.  i had been looking out one of the few small aircraft cargo/passenger cabin windows and saw what appeared to be a countless number of unusual circular patterns on the ground. i was literally shocked by the facial expression and response of the pilot and co-pilot when i asked about the circles.  they turned to me and looked directly into my eyes. they were visibly like in a state of shock (wide-eyed) by my questioning them about my ground observation. the pilots then almost simultaneously said in a fearful and foreboding tone, "you really don't want to know!"  i took the strong hint of warning and immediately left the cockpit area with saying another word.   i can't image what type of farming or crop growths which required circular patterns.  another consideration was that the circles appeared similar to that of individual or groups of water treatment facilities.  

i wish i had a camera to take pictures of what were the same size circles in various patterns covering an area which i believe we're several states. but, i would have probably been admonished and/or told i was violating security protocols while onboard a military aircraft. regardless, this left an impression permanently etched in my memory.
content.summary: Occurred flying over the northwest united states heading towards alaska.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 19:20 i was driving home from my moms house after xmas eve dinner. a strange red light in the sky caught my eye while driving west on shadow valley drive. i slowed the car to a near stop and watched the object for about 45 seconds. i noticed it was shaped like a diamond and that it was nearly transparent. the red color of the object was continuously fluctuating as does a star. it remained primarily red but also appeared orange and yellowish as it would "blink". i resumed my drive home and approx 2 mins later was driving southbound on harrison blvd toward the south ogden area. i still had a visual on the object, and when i drove to a more open area, i noticed a second, identical object hovering about 100-200 feet below the first object. as the two were hovering a third identical object arrived from the east and i estimate it was traveling around 400-500 mph. i base this estimate upon the many air force planes i have witnessed throughout my life, having lived outside of hill air force base for over 30 years. as quickly as the third object arrived, it came to an immediate and abrupt stop, 20-30 feet from the first object. i watched the 3 objects as best i could while driving and at last sight, all 3 objects had begun traveling quite slowly to the northwest. i turned the car around to try and get a better idea of where they were going, but could no longer see them. i was debating on making this report when i noticed a friend of mine on facebook had posted a video of one of the objects that he noticed sometime after my sighting. i have not asked for his permission to add his info to this report, or i would have included it as well. i'm sure i can obtain a copy of the video if it is needed.
content.summary: 3 diamond shaped, translucent, red-orange ufo's hovering and flying in ogden utah

content.detailedDescription:
I was just leaving work going home on the morning of march 30 1979.It was a


 bit overcast and grey.The time was exactly 7:15 am.As soon as i entered onto interstate 20 something said  look up and when  i did i saw a round silver spaceship about 300 ft in diameter hovering at a 45 degree angle over the expressway.  i could not believe my eyes but there it was in plain sight just off to the left above the west end mall exit sign.My uncle and his girlfriend also saw the spaceship as well as a former co-worker. i wonder to this day if anyone else saw it but were too afraid to talk about it.That sighting took place 36 years ago and still haunts me today.I do not have photos for i saw this from my car while driving.Another note that i want to mention is that i was so astounded that i got off at the next exit and went back to get another look and just that quick it was gone or either cloaked itself and rendered itself invisible.My co-worker who is now deceased said that it did make the evening news. to this very day every time i have to travel that route on i-20 i always without fail look up
at the very site in which i saw the ufo. one final note worth mentioning is that while trying to satisfy my curiosity about who else may have seen it,i ran across a testimony on the internet in which this man and his wife while traveling from jacksonville to atlanta also said they saw the same possible ufo from their  plane. the clue to me was that it was on the same exact date that i saw it -  3/30/1979.Also when i finally got home i looked back towards downtown atlanta and saw a very brilliant light in the sky just hovering.
content.summary: Saw silver disc shaped ufo over interstate i 20. in atlanta ga.

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting in our yard talking (5 friends in total) when i observed two red glowing orbs east of us. i yelled out and we started recording videos ands taking photos on our phones. they flew silently and very quickly towards us, directly over us, then towards miami international airport.
the two objects were synchronized in their flight, very deliberate and very very fast with absolutely no sound. one of them began to dim while in flight over our heads and looked translucent, almost like a jellyfish. the second one remained bright red as if flew nw and out our range of sight.
content.summary: Witnessed two glowing red orbs travel quickly and silently from se to nw

content.detailedDescription:
We (5 people) were sitting in our yard talking when i observed two red glowing orbs east of us. i yelled out and we started recording videos ands taking photos on our phones. they flew silently and very quickly towards us, directly over us, then towards miami international airport.
the two objects were synchronized in their flight, very deliberate and very very fast with absolutely no sound. one of them began to dim while in flight over our heads and looked translucent, almost like a jellyfish. the second one remained bright red as if flew nw and out our range of sight.
content.summary: Two red orbs flew silently from se to nw over our home

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my parents for christmas. i just took a load of presents out to my vehicle. after placing them in the back seat, closed the door and looked up. i noticed two very bright lights in the sky above my parents garage, to the east. these were very bright and stationary. no noise, no pulsating or anything, just bright steady orange/red light.

i watched these lights for about a minute. initially, i thought to myself these could be planes taking off from the waukesha airport as i have noticed this in the past growing up here at this house. then i thought to myself--can't be. the lights are the wrong color and not moving. the landing lights always shut off eventually or the plane flies by overhead. i watched these lights for about a minute. then ran into the house and got others to come out.

my brother-in-law came out first and was immediately shocked. we watched the left light fade out and disappear. it was if the light was traveling at a very high rate of speed away from me. it faded and then could no-longer be seen. the light to the right did not move or change brightness. i ran back to the house as the kids were not coming out--i wanted them to see. as we ran out and down the yard, joe (brother-in-law) said the light moved abruptly sideways (to the left i think--would be north--he would have to confirm). as we watched the light then began  to fade as the first one did. i told the kids and joe i thought the object was traveling away from us at a high rate of speed. eventually it disappeared.

the kids were scared when they saw the object. i have to admit i felt like my hair was standing on end. 

my sister and wife kept saying someone is flying a drone or something. i was thinking we just witnessed very rare secret aircraft and the light was afterburners as they were flying away from us, or this was something not of this world. joe thinks this was not a plane as we know them. i have to agree, an afterburner that bright would certainly be noticeable, and if not by me, by many others as this area is close to the milwaukee and waukesha areas. i have witnessed many air force fly-bys with afterburners. they usually look blue/white and are very loud. i have seen them at night as well, this was not a conventional after burner. 

i went back into the house and looked at a website called flight aware.  there were no aircraft in the area for a 100-miles or more. there was one that would have been west of my location flying north-west.

i looked around in the sky for a while afterward. nothing. i looked on the horizon to the west, i could see the radio towers several miles away with their flashing red lights--defiantly not one of these.

about 20-30-minutes later my wife and i left for home.
content.summary: Two red/orange very bright objects hovering in sky for several minutes, then disappeared.
